examples.input: Total number of test drives in December 2023
examples.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT sales_lead) FROM sales_inventory_saleslog WHERE new_value IN ('Test Drive Completed', 'Delivery Given', 'Order Booked') AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM created_date) = 12 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM created_date) = 2023;

examples.input: Total number of leads in December 2023
examples.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sales_inventory_saleslead WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM created_date) = 12 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM created_date) = 2023;

examples.input: Number of qualified leads in December 2023 by Amit
examples.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sales_inventory_saleslead WHERE assigned_to = (SELECT id FROM auth_user WHERE username = 'Amit Ashara') AND status = 'Qualified' AND state = 'Open' AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM created_date) = 12 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM created_date) = 2023;

examples.input: Number of all leads  in December 2023:
examples.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sales_inventory_saleslead WHERE assigned_to = 'Amit Ashara' AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM created_date) = 12 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM created_date) = 2023;

examples.input: Number of Yet to be contacted leads by Amit Ashara in December 2023
examples.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sales_inventory_saleslead WHERE status = 'Yet to Contact' AND assigned_to = 'Amit Ashara' AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM created_date) = 12 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM created_date) = 2023;

examples.input: Number of Test Drives leads by Amit Ashara in December 2023
examples.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sales_inventory_saleslead WHERE status = 'Qualified' AND state = 'Open' AND assigned_to = 'Amit Ashara' AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM created_date) = 12 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM created_date) = 2023;

examples.input: Number of Delivery Given leads by Amit Ashara in December 2023
examples.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT sales_lead, new_value) FROM sales_inventory_saleslog WHERE new_value = 'Delivery Given' AND assigned_to = 'Amit Ashara' AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM created_date) = 12 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM created_date) = 2023;

examples.input: Number of Bookings leads by Amit Ashara in December 2023
examples.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT sales_lead) FROM sales_inventory_saleslog WHERE new_value = 'Order Booked' AND assigned_to = 'Amit Ashara' AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM created_date) = 12 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM created_date) = 2023;

examples.input: Number of Delivery Given by Walk-in in December 2023
examples.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT sales_lead) FROM sales_inventory_saleslog WHERE new_value = 'Delivery Given' AND sales_lead_source = 'Walk-in' AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM created_date) = 12 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM created_date) = 2023;

examples.input: Calculate Percentage of Conversion and Test drives done by Amit Ashara:
examples.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_leads, ROUND((COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN new_value IN ('Test Drive Completed', 'Test Drive Feedback Completed', 'Under Negotiation', 'Order Booked', 'Payment Received', 'Delivery Given', 'Delivery Feedback Completed') THEN sales_lead END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)), 2) AS test_drive_percentage, ROUND((COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN new_value IN ('Delivery Given', 'Delivery Feedback Completed') THEN sales_lead END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)), 2) AS conversion_percentage FROM sales_inventory_saleslog WHERE sales_lead_assigned_to = 'Amit Ashara';

examples.input: Sales of Mercedes Benz A class count in December 2023
examples.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sales_inventory_saleslead WHERE interested_in_model_name = 'Mercedes Benz' AND interested_in_make_name = 'A Class' AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM created_date) = 12 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM created_date) = 2023;
